attributes.action: Two drunken males be dropped off at the offices of the Daily Record
attributes.additional_details:
That the Government take issue with the scandalous reporting of Paul O'Hare of the Daily Record.
We demand two aggressively drunken men are dropped at his office for him to try and deal with better than the Police.
This to be filmed by laughing officers who will not assist in any way except to give feedback as to how he could have done it better.
